text: 90% Short distal phalanx of finger 90% Short stature 90% Abnormality of the metacarpal bones 50% Anonychia 50% Camptodactyly of finger 50% Hypoplastic toenails 50% Postaxial foot polydactyly 50% Split foot 50% Symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand 50% Toe syndactyly 50% Kyphoscoliosis 5% Aplasia/Hypoplasia of toe - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Cognitive impairment - Cutaneous finger syndactyly - Duplication of metatarsal bones - Intellectual disability - The Human Phenotype Ontol
